page.title: 12Employment - Mattingley Area
page.content: The only industry in the block is a saw-mill & joiners & it employs a number of local people.{The majority {of residents are employed outside the {block unless they work on the farms. There are several self-employed people, mainly in the building trade One family breeds rabbits which provides employment for the father & two sons. There is also a taxi firm in the area and a number of people operate businesses from their houses. {Unemployment}is not a real problem in this area though some school-leavers have difficulty in obtaining jobs & often have to be prepared to move out of the villages or to{commute}to London or the larger surrounding towns.
